title: nidamoru taram
sahitya:
nidamoru taramEnum ninaindiDu manamE nIlamEga shyAmaLanai nI


anupallavi

  vida vidamAgavE vindai purinda madurApuri vAzh mAyanai Ayanai


caraNam    eNNil aDangA janmam eDuttu nAm maNNil puzhuvena mAindu maDiyAmal
 hitam tarum inba vIDaDaindiDavE shatam enru avan pAdAmbujattinai
